channel.title: TeekX - Fun Pking@!
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://teekx-rsps.com][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2copfme.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://teekx-rsps.com/webclient.html][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30jtkiw.png[/img][/url]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/home.png[/img][url=http://www.teekx-rsps.com]Home[/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/cliiiiiiiiient.png[/img][url=http://www.teekx-rsps.com/playnow.html]Client Download![/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/weblcient.png[/img][url=http://teekx-rsps.com/forum/index.php?/topic/162-teekx-official-rules/]Rules[/url]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ylpwzm.png[/img]
[center]
[b]Developers:[/b] - Mod TeekX
[b]Community Manager:[/b] - Mod Jack
[b]Staff Team:[/b] - Camel - OPEN - OPEN
[b]Support Team:[/b] - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN[/center]
[b]We are currently looking for STAFF MEMBERS![/b]
[b]What is TeekX 718??[/b]
TeekX is a Pvp based server, designed for pkers to compete against each other and determine who's the best. With our new killstreak system and upgradable weapons if you choose us, you won't regret it.
[b]What makes TeekX unique? and stand out from other servers?[/b]
We have many features that other servers don't have like... Stake on the spot! to killstreaks and upgradable weapons..
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/15ceej8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/w8qatg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ibdjkl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zoxqiq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34nqm34.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/11c75li.png[/img]
[b]So is it Spawn or Eco?[/b]
It's a small Eco server, you start out by doing ::gear and get given a limited pk set to fight with. You gain cash by skilling, pvming or Pking!
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/5y800.png[/img]
[b]Is there any type of Pk System?[/b]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wu2e4j.png[/img]
Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items.
1) A Pk Token
2) 2.5M Cash
3) an Upgrade Token
4) Killstreaks
[b]What can i buy with a Pk Token?[/b]
You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, Vesta items and torva ECT.
[b]What can i do with 2.5M?[/b]
You can save your cash and upgrade your starter gear by buying better items such as torags, dharoks and bandos.
[b]What is an Upgrade Token?[/b]
Okay, certain weapons like, armadyl godsword, bandos tasset, bandos chestplate, dragon claws and dragon dagger + ALOT MORE. You can right click them and click upgrade IF you have enough Upgrade Tokens, an upgraded weapon is better then the normal weapon.
[b]What is the Killstreak system like?[/b]
The current system is every 10 kills you get without dying you'll receive a "killstreak cape" it goes from 10-90 kills and each one has better bonuses. You'll also receive x2 more tokens and cash once you reach 10kills.
[b]Hosting Information[/b]
We are currently hosted by a very powerful dedi which has got 4 cores at 3.8ghz 200gb Storage space and the speed.... well take alook at this picture..
[img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/2621970752.png[/img]
[b]Server Content:[/b]
- Flawless switching. - Great combat. - Granite Maul. - Upgradable Weapons - Dicing - KillStreaks - Pk Ranks, With scoreboard - Auras - Clan Wars. - Duel on the spot! - 50+ Players
[b]Client Content:[/b]
- 718 Cache - Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode. - Clean and tidy.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2wcmy4k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1z1toxc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34dius3.png[/img]
[b]NOTICE*[/b] This was the default 718 matrix base. I was going to remake tizenx v1 which i did but now i made it into my own thing.
[B]CREDITS![/b] - YaBwoiTK (Me) - Sixpack - SonicForce41 - Matrix team for the base.[/B][/center]

item.title: TeekX - Fun Pking@!
item.dc:creator: @project-ufo project-ufo
item.description:
@project-ufo wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:2, topic:528923”]jesus did i just see 800mb+ upload but only 400mb download? What’s up with that? lol…

Good luck I guess. if this is an eco server why do you need pk points to swap prayers? just curious. If an eco requires skilling a skiller couldn’t swap curses?[/quote]

Haha yeh.

BUMP!

Read full topic

item.title: TeekX - Fun Pking@!
item.dc:creator: @Teek_X Teek X
item.description:
@Teek_X wrote:

[CENTER]

Home
Client Download!
Rules

[center]

Developers:

  • Mod TeekX

Community Manager:

  • Mod Jack

Staff Team:

  • Camel
  • OPEN
  • OPEN

Support Team:

  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN[/center]

We are currently looking for STAFF MEMBERS!

What is TeekX 718??

TeekX is a Pvp based server, designed for pkers to compete against each other and determine who’s the best. With our new killstreak system and upgradable weapons if you choose us, you won’t regret it.

What makes TeekX unique? and stand out from other servers?

We have many features that other servers don’t have like… Stake on the spot! to killstreaks and upgradable weapons…

2ibdjkl.png765×503

1zoxqiq.png759×498

34nqm34.png758×498

11c75li.png762×500

So is it Spawn or Eco?

It’s a small Eco server, you start out by doing ::gear and get given a limited pk set to fight with. You gain cash by skilling, pvming or Pking!

Is there any type of Pk System?

Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items.

  1. A Pk Token

  2. 2.5M Cash

  3. an Upgrade Token

  4. Killstreaks

What can i buy with a Pk Token?

You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, Vesta items and torva ECT.

What can i do with 2.5M?

You can save your cash and upgrade your starter gear by buying better items such as torags, dharoks and bandos.

What is an Upgrade Token?

Okay, certain weapons like, armadyl godsword, bandos tasset, bandos chestplate, dragon claws and dragon dagger + ALOT MORE. You can right click them and click upgrade IF you have enough Upgrade Tokens, an upgraded weapon is better then the normal weapon.

What is the Killstreak system like?

The current system is every 10 kills you get without dying you’ll receive a “killstreak cape” it goes from 10-90 kills and each one has better bonuses. You’ll also receive x2 more tokens and cash once you reach 10kills.

Hosting Information

We are currently hosted by a very powerful dedi which has got 4 cores at 3.8ghz 200gb Storage space and the speed… well take alook at this picture…

Server Content:

  • Flawless switching.
  • Great combat.
  • Granite Maul.
  • Upgradable Weapons
  • Dicing
  • KillStreaks
  • Pk Ranks, With scoreboard
  • Auras
  • Clan Wars.
  • Duel on the spot!
  • 50+ Players

Client Content:

  • 718 Cache
  • Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode.
  • Clean and tidy.

NOTICE*
This was the default 718 matrix base. I was going to remake tizenx v1 which i did but now i made it into my own thing.

CREDITS!

  • YaBwoiTK (Me)
  • Sixpack
  • SonicForce41
  • Matrix team for the base.[/B][/center]
